Text: Sorry for the slow initial seed.  Please help seed once complete.
Big thanks for the upload! I have been looking for this book for years and didn't want to pay crazy prices for it.

Glad you both liked it.  I hope the price for the used books will go down, and maybe the remaining copies in the libraries will stop being ripped off.  The casual fan can read the PDF version, leaving the paper books for the hardcore fans.

If anyone has the skills, I'd like someone to edit the PDF increasing the contrast a little for better readability, and spell-check the OCR data for better searchability.  Post your torrent and point to it here in the comments section.
